name: Joel DOE, et al., petitioners, v. BOYERTOWN AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT, et al.
name_abbreviation: Doe v. Boyertown Area Sch. Dist.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Joel DOE, et al., petitioners,
v.
BOYERTOWN AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT, et al.
attorneys: Motion of Ryan T. Anderson for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.
casebody.head_matter:
Joel DOE, et al., petitioners,
v.
BOYERTOWN AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT, et al.
No. 18-658.
Supreme Court of the United States
May 28, 2019.
Motion of Ryan T. Anderson for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.
